Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the location of the swimming pool, stating that it is in Davao Occidental in the south Philippines when it is actually located in the Maldives.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the swimming pool is not in the Philippines but in the Maldives.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading post and does not provide accurate information about the location of the swimming pool.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the swimming pool is in Davao Occidental in the south Philippines without verifying the information.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim could have an alternative explanation that the person who shared it may have been misinformed or intentionally misleading.
